insights.populationGrowth: Rapid growth at 2.1% annually, fastest growing province due to industrial development and urban migration from rural areas.
insights.educationLevel: Highest education levels with 94% literacy. Advanced technical education supports industrial and service sectors.
insights.employmentPattern: Industry/manufacturing 40%, services 30%, construction 15%, agriculture 10%, government 5%. Most industrialized employment profile.
insights.housingPattern: Modern apartments 70%, individual houses 25%, minimal ger districts 5%. Most modern housing stock in Mongolia.

insights.temperature: Continental climate moderated by industrial activity, winters (-22째C) and summers (26째C). Urban heat island effects from industrial operations.
insights.precipitation: Annual precipitation 300mm, adequate for industrial and urban needs. Good water management systems support population growth.
insights.seasonality: Mild winter by Mongolian standards, pleasant spring, warm summer, comfortable autumn. Industrial heating reduces winter severity impacts.
insights.extremeEvents: Rare dzud impacts due to urban nature, occasional industrial air pollution episodes, summer thunderstorms with urban flooding potential.
